name: MyCausora Donation Widget
author: mybuddyhoward

sections.description:
MyCausora is a free fundraising solution for websites and nonprofits that want to support their favorite cause.
MyCausora enables you to easily accept donations for a cause of your choice on your website, and for every $ donated your users will receive an equal amount of thank you rewards from over 150+ merchants such as ZipCar, thebouqs, NOVICA and Bliss Spa.
How do I join MyCausora?
Go to https://causora.com/mycausora/ and click on get started.

How it works
MyCausora has created a new platform that links donors, charities, and businesses. Businesses are able to be philanthropic while gaining new, like-minded customers. Causes and charities raise more money and can give donors a thank you gift. When users donate $ to a cause, they receive $ to spend with Causora thank you rewards (e.g. Donate $20, get $20 to spend). Everyone wins.

Why MyCausora? Your Benefits

  • Free to use
  • Promote and support your favorite cause
  • Generate donations from your own website
  • Offer valuable thank-you rewards to your users for FREE
  • Incentivize donations on your website with Causora credits that are redeemable at over 150+ socially conscious merchants like zipcar, thebouqs, NOVICA, GOOD magazine, etc.
  • Customize the MyCausora widget and pick a cause that you want to support
  • Secure payment processing
  • Detailed reporting and support

MyCausora Features:

  • Pick your favorite cause from over 200+ causes
  • Automatically receive one Causora thank you rewards for every dollar that you donate
  • Streamlined checkout process with data capture
  • Default payment amounts, or allow your customers to choose.

Coming soon

  • Recurring donation features
  • Additional payment methods (bitcoins, mobile payments)
  • Multi-currency support
  • Enhanced reporting

If you have suggestions for a new feature, please email us at support@causora.com

Want regular updates? Join our social media.

http://facebook.com/causora

http://twitter.com/causora
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder to your plugins directory /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Use the shortcode [mycausora] anywhere you can use shortcodes.
  4. If you want to put the widget (shortcode) in a Widget, you’ll need to allow shortcodes in widgets
sections.faq: If you have suggestions for a new feature, please email us at support@causora.com
